#summary How to add JType to a Maven project.

= Getting started with Maven =

To start using JType in a [http://maven.apache.org/ Maven] project, add the following dependency and repository definition to the POM:

{{{
<project>
	...
	<dependencies>
		<dependency>
			<groupId>com.googlecode.jtype</groupId>
			<artifactId>jtype</artifactId>
			<version>0.1.0</version>
		</dependency>
	</dependencies>
	
	<repositories>
		<repository>
			<id>jtype</id>
			<name>JType Maven Repository</name>
			<url>http://jtype.googlecode.com/svn/repository/</url>
			<snapshots>
				<enabled>false</enabled>
			</snapshots>
		</repository>
	</repositories>
	...
</project>
}}}
